[HEADING] One-Year Degree in Advanced Analytics
[HEADING] Join our community. Introduce yourself today!
[HEADING] Contact Us
The MIT Sloan Master of Business Analytics (MBAn) program equips students with the skills to tackle business challenges using modern data science in just 12 months. Established in collaboration with MIT's Operations Research Center, this business program is designed for aspiring data science professionals, particularly engineers, mathematicians, physicists, and programmers. This analytics masterâ€™s program meets the industryâ€™s demand for graduates who can apply data science to solve complex business challenges.
